title: Interference of sea salt in capture vaporizer-ToF-ACSM measurements of biomass burning organic aerosols in coastal locations

The capture vaporizer (CV) was developed to reduce uncertainties in non-refractory aerosol composition measurements made using the Aerosol Mass Spectrometer (AMS) and the Aerosol Chemical Speciation Monitor (ACSM). Use of...
